TestCase.name: testStarSchemaJoin
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM (SELECT a, SUM(b) FROM x GROUP BY a) T1, (SELECT a, AVG(b) FROM x GROUP BY a) T2, (SELECT a, COUNT(b) FROM x GROUP BY a) T3 WHERE T1.a = T2.a AND T1.a = T3.a

LogicalProject(a=[$0], EXPR$1=[$1], a0=[$2], EXPR$10=[$3], a1=[$4], EXPR$11=[$5]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(=($0, $2), =($0, $4))]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) : :- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[SUM($1)]) : : +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1]) : : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, x, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) : +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[AVG($1)]) : +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, x, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[COUNT($1)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, x, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

MultipleInputNode :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) : +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[a], select=[a, Partial_AVG(b) AS (sum$0, count$1)]) : +- Calc(select=[a, b], reuse_id=[1]) : +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, x, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) : +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[a], select=[a, Partial_SUM(b) AS sum$0]) : +- Reused(reference_id=[1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[a], select=[a, Partial_COUNT(b) AS count$0]) +- Reused(reference_id=[1])
